condition: [NOT]([AND]([EQ](<*VALUE(Virtualization_Platform_Options)*>,Premium Platform for Nutanix),[EQ] (<*VALUE(Nutanix License Type)*>, Per Core),[GT](<* Eval(<*CTX ( Container(Virtualization_Single_Node_Cluster_Conf_transpose).Sum(No_of_Nutanix_Premium_Platform_32_Core_SC) )*> * 1) *>,0)))
